Title: The Common Man

Actors: Jean Carmet, Pierre Tornade, Jean Bouise, Michel Peyrelon
Plot: As every summer, Georges Lajoie, his wife Ginette and grown-up son Léon go on holiday to Loulou's campsite. They join old friends, the Schumachers and the Colins. Brigitte Colin, the ...
